entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

/* 页面整体背景 */body { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #B041FF 0%, #6E25D1 50%, #3A1078 100%); background-attachment: fixed; background-size: cover; color: #fff; font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow-x: hidden;}/* 页面内容容器，增加一些阴影和圆角，提升视觉效果 */.container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1); border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);}/* 标题样式 */h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6 { color: #fff; text-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5);}/* 链接样式 */a { color: #B041FF; text-decoration: none; transition: color 0.3s ease;}a:hover { color: #FF9EF3;}/* 文章卡片样式 */.post-card { background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05); border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px; transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;}.post-card:hover { transform: translateY(-5px); box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(176, 65, 255, 0.5);}/* 页脚样式 */.footer { text-align: center; padding: 20px; margin-top: 50px; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); border-radius: 10px;}/* 导航栏样式 */.nav { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); padding: 15px; border-radius: 10px; margin-bottom: 30px;}.nav ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center;}.nav li { margin: 0 15px;}.nav a { color: #fff; font-weight: bold;}.nav a:hover { color: #B041FF;}
